Title: Math-C5 Addition & combing
Content: 本节课我们学习63-64课时 Math数学课 Chapter 5 Addition & combing and joining within 10s主要学习内容如下:【1】通过学习从蛋中孵出不同动物的课件,让孩子们理解10以内的数字相加addition的表达方法【2】学习的数学语言有;add加,in all总共,join加入,学习了两个数学符号:‘+’plus sign加法,‘=’equal sign等于号【3】2+3=5这个等式有三种不同的表达方法Two plus three equals five. Two and three is five. The sum of two and three is five. 重点掌握第一种。【4】通过手势,比出2+3=5这个等式,让孩子们更形象地掌握等式的表达方式.【5】本节课生词:alligator短嘴鳄, chameleon变色龙, plate盘子,hill小山,slide滑梯,swing秋千, teeter-totter跷跷板,volleyball排球,grill烤架,bug小虫,sailboat小帆船,cupcake纸杯蛋糕, peacock孔雀,flamingo火烈鸟,astronaut宇航员,firefighter消防员.【6】关键句: What's this sign? It's an equal sign.What is two plus three?Two plus three equals five.

Title: HSP-L11 to 12 Plant Parts
Content: 本节课我们学习65-66课时 HSP 科学课 Unit 3 Plants. Lesson 11-12 Plant Parts & How does a Plant Grow?主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了一本小书How does a Plant Grow?【2】复习了植物的life cycle和生长需要的物质:water, air, soil, space, sunlight【3】学习了小文章Plant Parts. 内容是:seeds, roots, stem, leaf, flower, fruit. Plants are made up of parts. There are many kinds of leaves and flowers. Fruit grows from the flowers of some plants. Seeds grow in the fruit.【4】学习了小文章Plants Grow and Change. Seed—sprout—seeding—adult plant—flower—seed--… A plant has a life cycle. A plant changes as it grows.

Title: LA-Letter B - Baboon
Content: 本节课我们学习67-68课时Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter B - Baboon主要学习内容如下:【1】学习一种动物Baboons狒狒Baboons are big monkeys. 狒狒是大猴子.Baboons eat bananas.    狒狒吃香蕉.Baboons keep food in their cheek pouches.狒狒存食物在两腮.Baboons live in troops. 狒狒群居.【2】课堂上我们引导宝贝儿学习字母B的发音以字母B开头的单词:bib, bat,复习单词首字母表达:Banana/bus/bear/bicycle begins with letter B.复习单词首音表达:Banana/bus/bear/bicycle begins with the sound /b/.字母B的发音:B makes the sound /b/.学习单词尾音表达:Bib ends with the sound /b/.

Title: LA-Letter R-Raccoon
Content: 本节课我们学习69-70课时 Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter R-Raccoon 主要学习内容如下:【1】学习一种动物raccoon浣熊.Raccoons eat crayfish. 浣熊吃龙虾.Raccoons sleep in hollow trees.  浣熊住在空树洞里.Raccoons can live in forests. 浣熊可住在森林.Raccoons can live in cities. 浣熊可住在城市.【2】课堂上我们引导宝贝儿学习字母R的发音以字母R开头的单词: rat, bat,复习单词首字母表达:Ring/rake/roof/rainbow/Rain/rabbit/red/rhinoceros begins with letter B.复习单词首音表达:Ring/rake/roof/rainbow/Rain/rabbit/red/rhinoceros begins with the sound /r/.字母R的发音:R makes the sound /r/.学习单词尾音表达:Rat ends with the sound /t/.

Title: HSP-L13 to 14 Places to live
Content: 本节课我们学习71-72课时 HSP科学课 Unit 4 Lesson 13-14 Places to live and grow for animals and plants主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了解动物的居住处所和植物的生长环境: 科学阅读内容如下：理解A fish lives in a pond. A dog lives in a kennel. A bird lives in a nest. A bear lives in a cave. The spider lives on a web. The pig lives in a sty. A bee lives in a hive. The chicken lives in a coop. 简单了解A cow lives in a shed. The lion lives in a den. An ant lives in a mount hill. An owl lives in a tree hole.【2】学习了常见的五大栖息地:desert(沙漠),pond(池塘),prairie(草原),rainforest(雨林),forest(森林),了解了生活在不同栖息地里的植物和动物.Lizards(蜥蜴)/snakes/birds/cactuses(仙人掌) live in the desert.Beavers(海狸)/fish/insects(昆虫) live in the pond.Prairie dog (土拨鼠)/Prairie chicken(草原榛鸡)/snakes live in the prairie.Frogs/monkeys/chameleons(变色龙) live in the rainforest.Bears/bees/bats(蝙蝠) live in the forest.【3】了解动物和植物之间,动物和动物之间是如何相互依存共生.Plants are animals’ food. Plants are animals’ home. Some animals can enrich the soil.【4】学习小文章Homes for Living Tings. 内容是:habitat. Pond, ocean. Some animals and plants live in water habitats. Desert, rainforest. Some animals and plants live in land habitats. The animals and plants get what they needfrom their habitats.【5】学习小文章Animals and Plants Together. 内容是:Shelter, food. Some animals use plants fo shelter. Many animals need plantsfor food. Squriel, acorn. Plants need animals. Animals move seeds. The seeds may grow to become new plants.

Title: LA-Letter H-Hippo
Content: 本节课我们学习73-74课时Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter H-Hippo主要学习内容如下:【1】学习一种动物hippo河马.Hippos are big. 河马是大型动物.Hippos live near the river. 河马住在河边.Hippos have huge teeth. 河马有巨大的牙齿.Hippos eat plants. 河马吃植物.【2】引导宝贝儿学习字母H的发音以字母H开头的单词:ham,hit复习单词首字母表达:Helmet/helicopter/hill/heart/harp/honey/house begins with letter H.复习单词首音表达:Helmet/helicopter/hill/heart/harp/honey/house begins with the sound /h/.字母H的发音:H makes the sound /h/.引导孩子们学习看词能读,听音能写的能力,拼读:hit, hid, hot, hat, ham, has.

Title: LA-Letter I-Iguana
Content: 本节课我们学习75-76课时Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter I-Iguana主要学习内容如下:【1】我们学习了野生动物 iguana蜥蜴Iguanas hatch from eggs. 蜥蜴是卵生动物.Iguanas have long tails. 蜥蜴有长尾巴.Iguanas sleep in the sun. 蜥蜴在白日睡觉.Iguanas eat plants. 蜥蜴吃植物.【2】学习了letter I的发音, I makes the sound /i/. 短音i我们还学了begin sound, middle soundIgloo/insect/inch/ink/in begins with letter I.Igloo/insect/inch/ink/in begins with the sound /i/.Bib has an /i/sound in the middle. 引导孩子们学习看词能读,听音能写的能力, 拼读 bib, rim, sit, min, nit, ...

Title: HSP-L15 Day Sky
Content: 本节课我们学习77-78课时 HSP科学课 Unit 5 Lesson 15 Day Sky主要学习内容如下:【1】学习Solar System中三个重要的星体:sun太阳,earth地球和moon月亮;【2】了解天空中太阳规律性的变化,了解sunrise, noon, sunset三个时候太阳的位置,low, high, low again. 引导学生明白太阳看起来是运动的,但实际上The sun is still. 静止不动的.原因是The earth is moving. (Earth is turning, and the sun stay in the same place.);【3】了解太阳、地球和月亮的运动轨迹,The earth is moving around the sun. The moon is moving around the earth. 他们的运动轨迹都是逆时针旋转的.简单了解地球自转和公转. 您可以在家里和宝贝儿一起演示这三个星体的运动轨迹,比如可以让爸爸当作太阳,妈妈当作月亮,宝贝儿当作地球;【4】明白白天和夜晚形成的原因:What causes/makes the day and night? The sunlight causes/makes the day and night;【5】复习K1所学,What can we see in the daytime sky? I see the sun, clouds, rainbow. 【6】简单了解云、雨、雪的形成, cold air和warm air冷暖气流交接.【7】学习小文章Day Sky. 内容是: Sky, sun, cloud.  Morning—noon—afternoon. We see the sun in the sky during the day. We also see clouds and other objects in the sky. During the day, the sun seems to move across the sky. Near, far. Objects near Earth look big. Objects far from earth look small.

Title: LA-Letter L-Leopard
Content: 本节课我们学习79-80课时 Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter L-Leopard主要学习内容如下:今天的学习内容如下:【1】我们学习了野生动物 leopard 美洲豹Leopards have spots. 美洲豹有斑点.Leopards climb trees. 美洲豹爬树.Leopards sleep during the day. 美洲豹白天睡觉.Leopards hunt at night. 美洲豹晚上捕食.【2】课堂上我们引导宝贝儿学习字母L的发音以字母L开头的单词: lit ,lot复习单词首字母表达:Lamp/ladder/lemon/lion/lollipop/ladybug/leaf begins with letter L.复习单词首音表达:Lamp/ladder/lemon/lion/lollipop/ladybug/leaf begins with the sound /l/.字母L的发音:L makes the sound /l/. 短音/l/学习单词尾音表达:Ball/doll ends with the sound /l/.  引导孩子们学习看词能读,听音能写的能力,拼读:hit, hid, hot, hat, ham, has.

Title: LA-Letter D-dolphin
Content: 本节课我们学习79-80课时 Language Arts语文课Unit 4 Wild Animals Fairs. Letter L-Leopard主要学习内容如下:今天的学习内容如下:【1】我们学习了野生动物 leopard 美洲豹Leopards have spots. 美洲豹有斑点.Leopards climb trees. 美洲豹爬树.Leopards sleep during the day. 美洲豹白天睡觉.Leopards hunt at night. 美洲豹晚上捕食.【2】课堂上我们引导宝贝儿学习字母L的发音以字母L开头的单词: lit ,lot复习单词首字母表达:Lamp/ladder/lemon/lion/lollipop/ladybug/leaf begins with letter L.复习单词首音表达:Lamp/ladder/lemon/lion/lollipop/ladybug/leaf begins with the sound /l/.字母L的发音:L makes the sound /l/. 短音/l/学习单词尾音表达:Ball/doll ends with the sound /l/.  引导孩子们学习看词能读,听音能写的能力,拼读:hit, hid, hot, hat, ham, has.

Title: Math-C6 Subtraction
Content: 本节课我们学习83-84课时 Math数学课Chapter 6 Subtraction & Differences within 10主要学习内容如下:【1】通过课件, 引导孩子们理解减法的推理过程, 是一个分解的过程, 从一个大的集合, 拿点一个小的集合, 变成了另一个小集合.【2】学习减法符号”-”minus sign.关键句: What's this sign? It's a minus sign.【3】学会减法的几种表达方法, 如7-2=5关键句: What is 7 minus 2? (1) Seven minus two is five. (2)Seven take away two is five. 重点掌握第一种.复习之前学过的表示方法.What is two fewer than seven? Two fewer than seven is five.【3】通过手势, 比出7-2=5这个等式, 让孩子们更形象地掌握等式的表达方式.【4】本节课生词:bowler投球手, rack架子, take away拿走, minus减, arrow箭头, light灯, knock down击倒, strike击中, sundae圣代, fall off跌落.

Title: HSP-L16 Night Sky
Content: 本节课我们学习85-86课时 HSP科学课 Unit 5 Lesson 16 Night Sky主要学习内容如下:【1】引导孩子们了解夜晚的星空:关键句: What color is the nighttime sky? It’s black. What Sparkles in the night sky? Stars sparkles in the night sky.【2】引导孩子们理解夜晚开始的原因:When does night begin? Night begins after sunset.【3】引导孩子们明白月亮有阴晴圆缺, 有8种月相: 关键句——Does the moon always look the same? No. How many phases of the moon are there? There are 8 phases of the moon.【4】引导孩子们了解新月New Moon和满月Full Moon, 在农历的每月初一, 当月亮运行到太阳与地球之间的时候, 月亮以它黑暗的一面对着地球, 并且与太阳同升同没, 人们无法看到它.这时的月相叫新月或朔月.Can you see new moon? No.【5】引导孩子们简单了解月相的成因:月球靠反射阳光发亮, 它与太阳相对位置不同(黄经差), 便会呈现出各种形状.What makes the phases of the moon? The position of the sun and the moon makes the phases of the moon.【6】引导孩子们复习Look Up这本书, 复习K1夜晚的天空.What can we see in the nighttime sky? I can see shooting stars. I can see the moon. I can see the storm/lightning/rain/snow/wind cloud.【7】学习小文章Night Sky. 内容是: Stars, moon. At night we might see stars in the sky. On most nights we see the moon. We may also see the moon during the day.

Title: Math-Half Semester Review
Content: 本节课我们学习 87-88课时 Math数学课 Half Semester Review 期中复习主要学习内容如下: 亲爱的家长朋友, 您好.今天我们上的是期中复习课, 复习之前学过的数学、语文和科学课程, 还进行了期中测试和公开课.到这里我们将近学习了半个学期了, 建议您坚持在家里反复给宝贝儿放辅导视频哦~感谢您的配合!
